message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be valuable to you. My initial offer for the product is $15000. I understand that this might be higher than what you were expecting, but I assure you, the quality and benefits justify this price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Can you consider this price?
